allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add point position visual feedback from LocoNet.

Show a black perpendicular line on the inactive arm of each point based on real-time position feedback. In production, LocoNetPointPositionService receives SwitchReportNotification messages and maps LocoNet addresses to point numbers. In development, LoggingPointPositionService simulates feedback from point and route notification events.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
